pages.text: Many would consider it a boon that no monsters spawn in this land, even when it's dark! However, if you want to get into a fight that badly, you can do so in the hunting dimension. $(br2) There, it is always night and monsters spawn in great numbers!

pages.name: Hunting Dimension Portal
pages.text: Right-click with any weapon in your hand to activate the portal. Wooden swords are the cheapest!

pages.title: Portal Frame
pages.text: The portal frame can be made by surrounding any vanilla arrow with 8 logs of the same type. Construct the portal structure like you would a nether portal!
